segments.text: Thanks for coming shopping with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so honored that you thought to ask me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've never given a speech in front of a thousand people before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're going to do great . And you're going to look great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Now let's decide which one of these suits looks best for this occasion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I still like the olive one best . There's a tailor here who can take up the sleeves for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The question is , can he have it done before Friday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These guys are professional . I think they can have it done tomorrow . Let's ask .
segments.speaker: S2
